jsfile.data: this.shown.pos = [0, 0];this.shown.z = 50;this.alwaysDraw = true;this.init = function (params) {this.cam = createCamera();window.test = this.cam;player.godMode = true;};this.update = function (params) {if (keyIsDown(70)) {this.cam.pan(-0.01);} else if (keyIsDown(72)) {this.cam.pan(0.01);}if (keyIsDown(84)) {this.cam.tilt(-0.01);} else if (keyIsDown(71)) {this.cam.tilt(0.01);}};this.draw = function (params) {if (Boolean(window?.editor)) {return;}push();lights();ambientLight(255);normalMaterial(255, 0, 0);rotateX(millis() / 1000);torus(50);pop();this.cam ??= createCamera();window.test = this.cam;let matrix = this.cam.cameraMatrix.copy();let glPosition = matrix.multiplyVec4(this.shown.pos[0] - engine.cameraPos.x,this.shown.pos[1] - engine.cameraPos.y,this.shown.z,1); /*engine.gui.translate(-width / 2, -height / 2);*/engine.gui.strokeWeight(8);engine.gui.point(width / 2 + glPosition[0], height / 2 + glPosition[1]);if (abs(glPosition[0]) > width / 2 ||abs(glPosition[1]) > height / 2 ||glPosition[2] > 0) {}engine.gui.strokeWeight(1);};

jsfile1.data: this.update = function (params) {let test = createVector(engine.mouseScreen().x,engine.mouseScreen().y,engine.mouseScreen().z);this.x = test.x;this.y = test.y;push();noStroke();normalMaterial();translate(this.x, this.y, test.z);rotateY(millis() / 2000);box(50, 50, 50, 1, 1);pop();};this.draw = function () {return 1;};
